sentences.english: Which makes them at the beginning of the Tiger issued a sonorous voice of the turn.
sentences.chinese: 這使得他們在虎年伊始發出了鏗鏘有力的轉折之聲。

sentences.english: First of all, may I extend my new year  greetings to all of you, because according to Chinese lunar calendar, today is the 10th day of the first month of the Year of the Tiger.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中國農曆虎年正月初十，我先給大家拜個晚年。

sentences.english: There`s no better time for The Little Tigers to reunite than the Year of the Tiger.
sentences.chinese: 虎年，無疑是小虎隊團聚的絕佳時間。

sentences.english: I wish the Year of Tiger will bring every body good luck.
sentences.chinese: 我祝各位虎年都交好運。

sentences.english: The Year of Tiger is a very lucky year.
sentences.chinese: 虎年是一個非常幸運的年份。

sentences.english: Chinese Lunar New Year Celebration Performance.
sentences.chinese: 學校學務虎年新春晚會。

sentences.english: Winter break the bell has gone off, the curtain was about to begin in mid-tiger.
sentences.chinese: 寒假的鐘聲已經敲響，虎年年的帷幕即將拉開。

sentences.english: According to the Chinese Zodiac, 2010is the Year of the Tiger.
sentences.chinese: 根據中國的黃曆，2010年是虎年。

sentences.english: Just to send my most sincere holiday greetings to you and your family.
sentences.chinese: 老張在此爲您和您的家人送上最誠摯的虎年祝福。

sentences.english: Zhu Peng Year of the Tiger faithful joyous, everything Shun Italy, good luck happy.
sentences.chinese: 祝朋友們虎年喜氣洋洋，事事順意，吉祥快樂。

sentences.english: What should you look for in your business in the year of the tiger?
sentences.chinese: 在虎年，你應該對你的生意有何展望呢？

sentences.english: The US Postal Service salutes the "Year of the Tiger" with a commemorative stamp issued Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 當地時間14日，美國郵政總局發行了虎年生肖郵票。

sentences.english: Last day to turn in Chinese Lunar New Year posters.
sentences.chinese: 學校學務虎年新春海報比賽截止收件。

sentences.english: People born in the Year of the Tiger are generally well liked because of their charming personalities.
sentences.chinese: 虎年出生的人個性極具魅力，因此廣受喜愛。

sentences.english: First day to turn in Chinese Lunar New Year posters.
sentences.chinese: 學校學務虎年新春海報比賽開始收件。

sentences.english: Post Chinese Lunar New Year Posters Contest results.
sentences.chinese: 學校學務公佈虎年新春海報比賽優勝者名單。

definition: Year of the Ox or Bull (e.g. 2009)
colloquial term for 生肖[sheng1 xiao4] the animals associated with the years of a 12-year cycle
twenty-eighth year H4 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2011 or 2071
twenty-seventh year G3 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2010 or 2070
thirtieth year J6 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 2013 or 2073
birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)
